Chef Jeremy: This is terrible. Terrible! That promising young chef Donath will be in the cooking competition, and unless I make something truly special I fear he will walk away with the top honors. But what to make, what to make? There IS one dish, but the ingredients are so difficult to get that I doubt I could acquire them in time. Unless... Hey, you there! Yes, you! Interested in a job? I need a brave and resourceful adventurer for a specific task. How would you like to assist me -- Chef Jeremy, the greatest chef of this region -- in making a fantastic dish?
